questions.text: Favorite way to spend a Saturday?
questions.yourAnswer: Creating something meaningful, usually with music in the background

questions.text: Coffee or tea?
questions.yourAnswer: Coffee, but I'll try any tea you recommend

questions.text: Morning person or night owl?
questions.yourAnswer: Night owl trying to become a morning person

questions.text: A color that makes you feel at home?
questions.yourAnswer: Warm beige, like morning light through curtains

questions.text: Right now, pick one: theater, ballet, or poetry?
questions.yourAnswer: I love how they're all performances of the human heart

questions.text: Best snack during a long rehearsal?
questions.yourAnswer: Dark chocolate, the kind that makes you pause

questions.text: Quiet nights in or lively nights out?
questions.yourAnswer: Quiet nights with the right person > loud nights with everyone

questions.text: Favorite season?
questions.yourAnswer: Fall—everything feels like it's preparing for something beautiful

questions.text: Would you rather watch a play or dance performance?
questions.yourAnswer: Dance—stories told without words hit different

questions.text: How do you celebrate a small win?
questions.yourAnswer: I do a little dance when no one's watching

questions.text: What quality do you value most in someone close to you?
questions.yourAnswer: Honesty wrapped in kindness

questions.text: Planned trip or spontaneous adventure?
questions.yourAnswer: Planned framework with room for spontaneous magic

questions.text: When you're worried, what helps most?
questions.yourAnswer: Creating something—it quiets the noise

questions.text: Ultimate comfort food?
questions.yourAnswer: My mom's cooking, but I'll never get the recipe right

questions.text: A poet or writer who changed how you see things?
questions.yourAnswer: Maya Angelou taught me that tenderness is strength

questions.text: How do you like to be encouraged when trying something new?
questions.yourAnswer: Quiet presence—knowing someone believes in me is enough

questions.text: Do you like surprises?
questions.yourAnswer: Small, thoughtful ones that show you were listening

questions.text: What's one small kindness that makes your day?
questions.yourAnswer: When someone notices I'm trying

questions.text: A memory that makes you feel most like yourself?
questions.yourAnswer: The first time I built something that made someone smile

questions.text: A fear you quietly manage?
questions.yourAnswer: That I'll miss the moment that matters most

questions.text: What's one thing you hope people notice about you?
questions.yourAnswer: That I pay attention to the small things

questions.text: A dream you haven't shared much?
questions.yourAnswer: To build beautiful things that make people feel less alone

questions.text: What does trust feel like to you?
questions.yourAnswer: Being able to be quiet together and it doesn't feel empty

questions.text: If you could make one rule everyone followed, what would it be?
questions.yourAnswer: Notice the people trying their best

questions.text: Best piece of advice you've ever received?
questions.yourAnswer: Do it afraid—courage isn't the absence of fear
